name: Curried Rice With Apples and Peas
keywords: apple, frozen peas, rice, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 medium-size apple, peeled, cored and cut into 1/4-inch cubes
3/4 cup frozen peas that have been thawed under hot water

recipeInstructions.text: Melt 1 tablespoon of the butter in a saucepan. Add the rice, onion, garlic, apple, curry powder and salt.
Cook briefly, stirring, but do not brown.
Add the water and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil, stirring. Cover tightly, and simmer for 17 minutes.
Remove from the heat. Add the peas and the remaining 1 tablespoon of butter. Fluff the rice with a fork.
Discard the bay leaf and serve.
